title: ‘We Are Paid to Win’: UAE Boss Defends Tadej Pogačar’s Giro d’Italia Onslaught
content:
UAE sport director says Pogačar tracking well for Giro-Tour double: 'We started the Giro with a plan, and we are following that plan perfectly.'

Read the full article at ‘We Are Paid to Win’: UAE Boss Defends Tadej Pogačar’s Giro d’Italia Onslaught on Velo.
author: ahood
